SMTC.background: Hong Hou previously served as President of Semtech's Signal Integrity Products Group

AAPL.background: Tim Cook served as COO before becoming CEO, joined Apple in 1998

MSFT.background: Satya Nadella previously led Microsoft's Cloud and Enterprise group

GOOGL.background: Sundar Pichai became Alphabet CEO in 2019, was Google CEO since 2015

AMZN.background: Andy Jassy founded and led AWS before becoming Amazon CEO

NVDA.background: Jensen Huang co-founded NVIDIA and has been CEO since inception

META.background: Mark Zuckerberg founded Facebook and has led the company since inception

TSLA.background: Elon Musk joined Tesla as chairman in 2004, became CEO in 2008
